main.name: Bhargava Sri Sai M K
main.bio: I’m a Computer Science undergraduate with hands-on experience in software development, embedded systems, and NLP-driven applications. I enjoy building practical, real-world solutions that bridge theory and implementation, whether through software systems or hardware-integrated projects. Beyond technical work, I’ve taken active roles in organizing and leading large-scale institutional initiatives, developing strong skills in leadership, collaboration, and execution. I’m driven by curiosity, continuous learning, and the desire to create meaningful technology that solves real problems.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

projects.title: DocAI Transformer Services
projects.about: Developed modular RESTful microservices for document summarization and question answering using transformer-based NLP models. Implemented scalable Python backends with optimized inference pipelines and extensible API design.

projects.title: Personalized Smart Workspace using Arduino
projects.about: Built an Arduino-based smart workspace to automate lighting, fan speed, and posture reminders using sensor data. Integrated embedded C++ logic with real-time environmental monitoring for enhanced productivity.

projects.title: Food Delivery Application (Console-Based)
projects.about: Designed a Java-based food delivery system with optimized menu search using segment trees. Implemented role-based access for customers and administrators using OOP principles.

projects.title: INIT Club Website
projects.about: Developed and maintained the official INIT Club website using HTML, CSS, and TypeScript. Collaborated with the core team to publish events, updates, and announcements for the community.

projects.title: NSS Attendance & Certificate Management System
projects.about: Built web-based tools to manage NSS attendance records and digital certificate distribution. Streamlined volunteer management and documentation processes for large-scale outreach programs.

projects.title: 46th Inter-District Athletic Meet
projects.about: Managed volunteers, logistics, and budgeting for a three-day inter-district athletic event. Coordinated multiple departments and successfully executed a large-scale institutional event with 500+ participants.
